title: Credit Card Calculator
seoTitle: Credit Card Calculator - Calculate Interest, Payments & Payoff Time
metaDescription: Calculate credit card interest, minimum payments, payoff time, and total cost. Find out how long it takes to pay off your credit card debt and save money by paying more than minimum.
description: Calculate how long it will take to pay off your credit card debt, total interest paid, and see the impact of making larger payments. Understand the true cost of carrying credit card balances.
instructions: Enter your current credit card balance. This is the total amount you owe on your credit card statement.
Enter the annual interest rate (APR). This is the rate your credit card charges, typically 15-25% APR. You can find this on your statement.
Enter your monthly payment amount. This is how much you plan to pay each month. Enter your minimum payment to see how long payoff takes.
Click 'Calculate' to see your payoff timeline, total interest paid, and monthly breakdown.

examples.title: Minimum Payment Scenario
examples.explanation: Paying only $150/month minimum on $5,000 at 18% APR takes 46 months and costs $2,437.50 in interest.

examples.title: Extra Payment Strategy
examples.explanation: Adding $100 extra monthly reduces payoff time by half and saves $1,508.75 in interest.

examples.title: High Balance Impact
examples.explanation: High-interest credit cards can make debt nearly impossible to pay off with minimum payments only.
